main event: A spectral object, the size of the head of a pencil, was observed on ground radar at Wheelus AFB in Libya. The object initially appeared to be a shooting star but then changed direction.
interesting points: The object did not alter its size during its flight until it disappeared instantaneously.
The object's path changed dramatically, crossing at 45 degrees, then 7 degrees.
Both visual and radar observations were made of the object.
The weather conditions were clear with a light wind.
sighted object: a spectral object, the size of a pencil's head
